examples.sentence_zh: 泄露的剧本使春节档电影的惊喜结局陷于危地。

examples.sentence: Being late jeopardized his chances of getting KFC's limited edition toys.
examples.sentence_zh: 迟到使他获取肯德基限量玩具的机会岌岌可危。

teach: jeopardize是危险游戏🎮的化身：源自法语'jeu parti'（五五开的赌局）🎲。用'危害'时像熊猫啃坏WiFi路由器🐼（jeopardize internet）；'使危困'时像外卖小哥暴雨中送餐🌧️；地道说法'玩火'叫play with fire🔥，'高风险'说high-stakes就像麻将杠上开花🀄。记住：每次冒险前先喊'杰宝带资'(jeopardize)！

tips: 谐音梗：'劫宝带资'→带着资金去冒险
易混词对比：endanger（客观危险） vs jeopardize（人为导致危险）

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自古法语'jeu parti'（平分游戏）→原指胜负未定的棋局，引申为'风险'。后缀-y表状态，如同在'perjury'(伪证)中。

examples.sentence: The Great Wall putters were in real jeopardy when the rainstorm hit.
examples.sentence_zh: 暴雨来袭时长城上的游客陷入真实危难。

examples.sentence: Panda habitats are in jeopardy due to bamboo flowering cycles.
examples.sentence_zh: 因竹子开花周期，熊猫栖息地正面临危难。

examples.sentence: Eating hotpot while scrolling Douyin puts your phone in jeopardy.
examples.sentence_zh: 边刷抖音边吃火锅会让手机处于危险中。

examples.sentence: The Forbidden City's wooden structures are in constant jeopardy of fire.
examples.sentence_zh: 故宫木制建筑长期面临火灾危险。

examples.sentence: My Xiaolongbao's integrity was in jeopardy when the delivery guy took the stairs.
examples.sentence_zh: 当外卖小哥走楼梯时，我的小笼包完整性岌岌可危。

examples.sentence: TikTok dances on the Great Wall put cultural relics in jeopardy.
examples.sentence_zh: 在长城跳抖音舞蹈会使文物陷入危险。

teach: jeopardy是游戏节目《危险边缘》的标题🎲，原意是'平分棋局'的古老赌博术语♟️。要说'危在旦夕'可以说hang by a thread（悬于一线），'高风险'叫high-stakes就像麻将清一色听牌🀄。记住：人生就像在瓷器店玩蹴鞠⚽——处处都是jeopardy！

tips: 谐音梗：'接怕的'→接到怕的事情就是危险
易混词：danger强调客观威胁，jeopardy强调胜负未定的风险
记忆法：把'jeopardy'拆成'jeo（接哦）+ pard（怕的）'

etymology.meaning_connection: 16世纪拟声词，模仿突然动作的声音，后引申出多重含义

examples.sentence: That jerk parked his bike in the elevator again!
examples.sentence_zh: 那个怪人又把自行车停电梯里了！

examples.sentence: Don't be such a jerk by microwaving stinky tofu in the office.
examples.sentence_zh: 别当办公室奇葩在微波炉热臭豆腐。

examples.sentence: The fishing line gave a sudden jerk when the carp bit.
examples.sentence_zh: 鲤鱼咬钩时鱼线猛地一抖。

examples.sentence: Her ponytail swung with every jerk of the roller coaster.
examples.sentence_zh: 过山车每次急拉她的马尾都飞起来。

examples.sentence: A jerk in his eyelid betrayed his nervousness during the interview.
examples.sentence_zh: 面试时他眼皮抽搐暴露了紧张。

examples.sentence: The patient's leg jerks are being monitored by smart socks.
examples.sentence_zh: 患者的腿部抽搐正被智能袜子监测。

examples.sentence: This Sichuan-style jerk numbs your tongue with peppercorns.
examples.sentence_zh: 这款川味牛肉干用花椒麻到你舌头跳舞。

examples.sentence: Airport jerks cost three times more than supermarket ones.
examples.sentence_zh: 机场卖的牛肉干比超市贵三倍。

examples.sentence: His hand jerked uncontrollably after 8 hours gaming.
examples.sentence_zh: 连续打游戏8小时后他的手不受控地痉挛。

examples.sentence: The dog jerks in sleep as if chasing dream rabbits.
examples.sentence_zh: 狗狗睡觉时抽搐像在追梦里的兔子。

examples.sentence: The metro train jerks when accelerating.
examples.sentence_zh: 地铁加速时会突然急拉。

examples.sentence: She jerked back as the hot pot oil splashed.
examples.sentence_zh: 火锅油溅起时她猛地后仰。

examples.sentence: He jerked the stuck zipper and broke it completely.
examples.sentence_zh: 他猛拉卡住的拉链结果彻底拉坏了。

examples.sentence: The fisherman jerked the rod to set the hook.
examples.sentence_zh: 渔夫猛拉鱼竿让鱼钩刺牢。

examples.sentence: The e-bike jerked off when a cat crossed the road.
examples.sentence_zh: 电动车因一只猫过马路而急刹。

examples.sentence: His knee-jerk reaction to criticism was deleting the post.
examples.sentence_zh: 他对批评的膝跳反应是删帖。

teach: jerk这词像抽搐的兔子腿🐰！作名词时既是'怪咖'（office jerk）也是'牛肉干'（spicy jerk）🥩，作动词时像抽筋的腿（muscle jerk）又像甩鱼竿（jerk the rod）🎣。说人'怪'可以用oddball，'猛拉窗帘'叫yank the curtains。记住：jerk的多重人格就像重庆的天气——说变就变！🌦️

tips: 谐音梗：'姐渴'→姐渴了猛拉(jerk)冰箱门
易混词：twerk（电臀舞）和jerk（抽搐）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根jerk表示'抽动'，后缀-ily构成副词→像触电般的动作方式

examples.sentence: The fishing line moved jerkily as the sturgeon struggled.
examples.sentence_zh: 鱼线随着鲟鱼的挣扎而痉挛性抽动。

examples.sentence: His left eyelid twitched jerkily after 72 hours of gaming.
examples.sentence_zh: 连续72小时游戏后，他的左眼睑开始痉挛性抽搐。

examples.sentence: The tractor moved jerkily along the muddy country road.
examples.sentence_zh: 拖拉机在泥泞的乡间小路上颠簸前行。

examples.sentence: Our jeep progressed jerkily through the Gobi Desert like a drunken camel.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们的吉普车像醉酒的骆驼一样在戈壁滩上颠簸行进。

examples.sentence: The old elevator moves jerkily like a sick dragon.
examples.sentence_zh: 旧电梯像生病的龙一样不平稳运行。

teach: jerkily是'抖音式移动'📱！想象：1) 打嗝时脖子的抽动🤯就是jerkily痉挛 2) 坐拖拉机吃火锅🍲时汤洒出来的节奏就是jerkily颠簸 3) 实用搭配：'jerkily unstable像5G信号📶' 4) 地道说法：'bumpy as a kangaroo ride袋鼠式颠簸' 5) 记住这三个画面：触电的猫🐱/卡顿的视频📹/跳跳糖在舌头上爆炸💥

tips: 谐音梗：'这颗粒'→这颗粒(jerkily)卡喉的呛咳动作
易混词对比：jerkily(不自主抽动) vs. bumpily(被动颠簸)
记忆tip：把y看成歪歪扭扭的轨迹线

etymology.meaning_connection: 16世纪源自法语'jerquin'，可能受荷兰语'jurk'(连衣裙)影响，后特指无袖短上衣

examples.sentence: The Elizabethan actor wore a leather jerkin with puffy sleeves underneath.
examples.sentence_zh: 伊丽莎白时代的演员穿着皮制无袖短上衣，内搭蓬松袖衬衫。

examples.sentence: His historical reenactment costume included a wool jerkin with brass buttons.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的历史重演服装包括一件带铜扣的羊毛无袖短上衣。

examples.sentence: The hunter's jerkin had special pockets for shotgun shells.
examples.sentence_zh: 猎人的短上衣设有专门存放猎枪子弹的口袋。

examples.sentence: She modified the vintage jerkin into a trendy cropped jacket.
examples.sentence_zh: 她把复古短上衣改造成了时髦的短款夹克。

examples.sentence: The mountain guide's buckskin jerkin repelled light rain effectively.
examples.sentence_zh: 山地向导的鹿皮短上衣能有效防小雨。

teach: jerkin是文艺复兴时期的'老头背心'👴！莎士比亚时代男人穿它就像现代程序员穿格子衫👔，既能保暖又方便挥剑决斗⚔️。搭配'leather jerkin'（皮马甲）秒变《权力的游戏》小恶魔，说'rock the jerkin'就是穿出复古潮范儿📜。记住：当代时尚圈把这古董叫'vest'，但真文青还是坚持用jerkin！

tips: 谐音梗：'杰克in'→杰克船长穿jerkin
易混词：jacket(有袖)/jerkin(无袖)

etymology.meaning_connection: 动词jerk（猛拉）+后缀-ing表动作过程

examples.sentence: The jerking of the old bus made my boba tea spill all over my new jeans.
examples.sentence_zh: 旧公交车的颠簸让我的珍珠奶茶洒在新牛仔裤上。

examples.sentence: I woke up from the jerking when my high-speed train entered the mountainous area.
examples.sentence_zh: 当高铁进入山区时的颠簸把我晃醒了。

examples.sentence: The sudden jerking of the elevator made office workers scream like they saw a celebrity.
examples.sentence_zh: 电梯突然的震摇让上班族们尖叫得像见了明星。

examples.sentence: Earthquake warnings can reduce injuries caused by violent jerking.
examples.sentence_zh: 地震预警能减少剧烈震摇导致的伤害。

examples.sentence: The jerking in his Mandarin pronunciation sounds like a buffering video.
examples.sentence_zh: 他中文发音的顿挫感像卡顿的视频。

examples.sentence: Good erhu players avoid unnecessary jerking between notes.
examples.sentence_zh: 优秀的二胡演奏者会避免音符间不必要的顿挫。

teach: jerking就是现实版的'抖音'📳！坐拖拉机是物理颠簸（bumpy jerking），KTV破音是声波震摇（sound jerking），而5G卡顿是数字顿挫（digital jerking）💢。搭配'violent jerking'比说'摇得厉害'更地道，四川人管这叫'颠得打摆子'🐍。记住这三摇：车摇、地摇、网卡摇！

tips: 谐音梗：'这课停'→这课停(jerking)时老师讲话一顿一顿
易混词对比：jumping（有规律的上下跳动） vs jerking（突然不规则的震动）
记忆tip：把字母j想象成颠簸的过山车轨道

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根jerk=猛地一拉/抽搐，后缀-y表形容词性质→形容动作不连贯；作名词时源自西班牙语charqui（肉干）

examples.sentence: The jerky movements of the robot cat went viral on Douyin.
examples.sentence_zh: 这只机械猫的急动动作在抖音上爆红。

examples.sentence: His jerky dance moves look like a Wi-Fi signal.
examples.sentence_zh: 他抽搐般的舞姿像极了Wi-Fi信号图。

examples.sentence: The jerky elevator gave me instant regret for eating hotpot.
examples.sentence_zh: 晃动的电梯让我瞬间后悔吃了火锅。

examples.sentence: We survived the jerky tuk-tuk ride in Bangkok.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在曼谷颠簸的突突车之旅中幸存下来。

examples.sentence: This Sichuan-style jerky numbed my entire mouth.
examples.sentence_zh: 这款川味牛肉干麻得我嘴巴失去知觉。

examples.sentence: Airport jerky prices are more terrifying than turbulence.
examples.sentence_zh: 机场牛肉干的价格比飞机颠簸更可怕。

teach: jerky是精神分裂型单词💥：作形容词时像卡顿的5G信号📶（jerky video），作名词时变成内蒙古伴手礼🐂（beef jerky）。美国拓荒时期肉干是'西部版辣条'🤠，搭配推荐：jerky movement（机械舞步）/make jerky（自制肉干），吐槽网速差可以说'This livestream is jerky than my ex!' 🧟‍♂️🍖💨

tips: 谐音梗：'劫客'→劫匪抢(jerky)走牛肉干
易混词对比：jerk（混蛋）vs jerky（肉干/抽动的）
记忆tip：抽动的(jerky)手在撕肉干(jerky)

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自英国海峡群岛中的Jersey岛，该岛以出产优质羊毛织物闻名

examples.sentence: The basketball player's jersey number 23 became legendary.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位篮球运动员的23号运动衫成为传奇。

examples.sentence: Fans waved their team jerseys during the World Cup finals.
examples.sentence_zh: 球迷在世界杯决赛时挥舞着球队运动衫。

examples.sentence: The home jersey features the team's traditional red color.
examples.sentence_zh: 主场队服采用该队传统的红色。

examples.sentence: This dress is made of breathable jersey material.
examples.sentence_zh: 这件连衣裙采用透气的针织面料制成。

teach: jersey原本是个岛名🏝️，现在却成了运动衫代名词！就像'茅台'本是地名变成酒名🍶。NBA球衣叫basketball jersey，足球服叫football jersey⚽。记住地道表达：'山寨球衣'叫knockoff jersey（就像莆田出品👟），'球衣号码'直接说jersey number。这件小衣服藏着大文化！

tips: 视觉记忆：字母J的形状像挂着衣架的球衣👕
易混词：sweater（毛衣）通常较厚，jersey更轻薄

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自古法语'geste'（行为、功绩），经词义演变转为'玩笑行为'

examples.sentence: His failed mooncake business became the jest of his family.
examples.sentence_zh: 他失败的月饼生意成了全家人的笑柄。

examples.sentence: The politician's typo turned him into a national jest.
examples.sentence_zh: 政治人物的笔误让他成了全国笑柄。

examples.sentence: He told a jest about two pandas ordering takeout.
examples.sentence_zh: 他讲了个关于两只熊猫点外卖的笑话。

examples.sentence: Ancient Chinese jest books contain wisdom in humor.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代中国笑话集蕴含幽默中的智慧。

examples.sentence: During tea breaks, colleagues jest about office life.
examples.sentence_zh: 茶歇时同事们常讲职场生活的笑话。

examples.sentence: Comedians jest about social phenomena in crosstalk shows.
examples.sentence_zh: 相声演员用社会现象编笑话。

examples.sentence: Netizens jest at the awkward translation signs.
examples.sentence_zh: 网友嘲笑那些尴尬的翻译标识。

examples.sentence: They jested behind his back about his outdated hairstyle.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们背后嘲笑他过时的发型。

examples.sentence: She jested her brother for mistaking wasabi for avocado.
examples.sentence_zh: 她嘲笑弟弟把芥末当成牛油果。

examples.sentence: Ancient poets often jested the corrupt officials.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代诗人常嘲讽贪官。

examples.sentence: His complaint about working overtime was said in jest.
examples.sentence_zh: 他抱怨加班只是开玩笑说的。

teach: jest就像脱口秀演员的折扇🎭！当名词时可以是'郭德纲的包袱'(Chinese jest)，也可以是'年度迷惑行为大赏'(become a jest)；当动词时就像朋友互怼🤪（jest about）。搭配'in jest'相当于中文'说着玩的'，而'standing jest'就是'经典老梗'🎪。记住：善意玩笑是banter，恶意嘲笑是mock！

tips: 谐音梗：'接斯特'→接梗高手(st)特别会讲jest
对比记忆：jest（轻松玩笑）vs jeer（恶意嘲笑）
联想：JEST=Just Enjoy Story Telling

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根jest=玩笑，-er表执行者→制造笑料的人

examples.sentence: The CEO hired a jester to lighten the mood during stressful meetings.
examples.sentence_zh: CEO雇了个笑话大师在紧张会议时调节气氛。

examples.sentence: Ancient Chinese jesters used crosstalk to entertain emperors.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代中国的笑话艺人用相声取悦皇帝。

examples.sentence: The jester at the Renaissance fair juggled dumplings.
examples.sentence_zh: 文艺复兴集市上的小丑用饺子玩杂耍。

examples.sentence: Like a court jester, he wears a hat with ringing bells.
examples.sentence_zh: 他像宫廷小丑般戴着叮当响的铃铛帽。

examples.sentence: He plays the jester but secretly advises the king.
examples.sentence_zh: 他表面扮演丑角，实则暗中给国王献策。

examples.sentence: Using jester's privilege, he mocked the emperor's new clothes.
examples.sentence_zh: 他利用小丑特权嘲讽皇帝的新装。

teach: jester是古代版脱口秀演员🎤！欧洲宫廷小丑戴着驴耳朵帽🎪（fool's cap），中国俳优说着'优孟衣冠'戏服👘。现代职场里'扮小丑'叫clown around，但别真成punching bag（出气包）！记住：好的jester要像周星驰，表面无厘头，内藏大智慧🤹♂️

tips: 谐音梗：'解压ster'→小丑是解压大师
易混词：joker（扑克王牌/爱开玩笑者）
记忆法：jest(玩笑)+er(人)=戴铃铛帽的人

etymology.meaning_connection: Jesu即Jesus（耶稣），-it表人→字面指'耶稣的人'。16世纪耶稣会成立后，因会士常担任告解神父，被新教徒认为过于诡辩，衍生出'阴谋家'的贬义。

examples.sentence: The Jesuit priest taught calculus in the Forbidden City.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位耶稣会神父曾在紫禁城内讲授微积分。

examples.sentence: Jesuit missionaries introduced Western astronomy to Ming Dynasty China.
examples.sentence_zh: 耶稣会传教士将西方天文学引入明代中国。

examples.sentence: He negotiated like a Jesuit, twisting every word to his advantage.
examples.sentence_zh: 他谈判时像个阴谋家，把每句话都曲解成对自己有利。

examples.sentence: The villain in the drama was a perfect Jesuit with his honeyed words.
examples.sentence_zh: 剧中反派是个满口甜言蜜语的阴险之徒。

usages.meaning: 金鸡纳树皮（耶稣会引入欧洲的疟疾特效药）

examples.sentence: Jesuit's bark saved countless lives during the colonial era.
examples.sentence_zh: 金鸡纳树皮在殖民时代拯救了无数生命。

teach: 这单词堪称宗教版川剧变脸🎭！本意是传播科学的耶稣会士🔭（如利玛窦），却因'太过聪明'被污名化为阴谋家🤫。就像火锅里的脑花🧠，爱的人觉得是智慧美味，怕的人觉得暗黑料理。搭配说'Jesuitical smile'（假笑）、'Jesuit oath'（严苛誓言），吐槽心机boy可以说'sly as a Jesuit'🍵。

tips: 谐音梗：'接水一体'→传教士接圣水仪式
易混词对比：Jew（犹太人）vs Jesuit（耶稣会士）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自法语'jeter'(投掷)，后引申出喷射与黑色矿物两个分支含义

examples.sentence: The dragon's breath came out in a jet of blue fire.
examples.sentence_zh: 巨龙的吐息形成一道蓝色火柱喷射而出。

examples.sentence: Meteor showers are caused by jets of cosmic dust.
examples.sentence_zh: 流星雨是宇宙尘埃流喷射造成的。

examples.sentence: The barista adjusted the milk jet on the espresso machine.
examples.sentence_zh: 咖啡师调整了意式咖啡机上的牛奶喷嘴。

examples.sentence: Never point the jet of a pressure washer at people.
examples.sentence_zh: 切勿将高压清洗机的喷口对准人。

examples.sentence: Victorian mourning jewelry was often made of jet.
examples.sentence_zh: 维多利亚时期的丧服首饰常用煤玉制作。

examples.sentence: This fossilized jet bead comes from the Silk Road.
examples.sentence_zh: 这颗煤玉珠子来自丝绸之路。

examples.sentence: The octopus jetted away in a cloud of ink.
examples.sentence_zh: 章鱼喷出墨雾后飞速游走。

examples.sentence: Water jetted 30 meters high from the broken pipe.
examples.sentence_zh: 水从破裂的管道中喷出30米高。

examples.sentence: Her jet hair shone like polished obsidian.
examples.sentence_zh: 她乌黑发亮的头发如同打磨过的黑曜石。

examples.sentence: The panther's jet coat rippled with muscle.
examples.sentence_zh: 黑豹油光发亮的皮毛下肌肉起伏。

examples.sentence: The traditional inkstick produces jet black calligraphy.
examples.sentence_zh: 传统墨锭能写出漆黑的书法。

examples.sentence: After flying to New York, I suffered from severe jet lag for days.
examples.sentence_zh: 飞抵纽约后，我时差反应严重持续数日。

teach: jet是单词界的'黑白双煞'🎭！作动词时像高压水枪🚿（jet water），作名词时既可以是飞机引擎的咆哮💨（jet engine），也可以是《哈利波特》里斯内普教授的头发🖤（jet black）。搭配jet lag时差反应就像身体在说：'我的生物钟还在故宫晒太阳呢！'🌞➡️🌙 记住：喷射用jet，漆黑用jet，时差jet lag别拼错！

tips: 谐音梗：'捷特'→特快喷射(jet)
易混词对比：jet vs. jam（喷射vs.卡住）

etymology.meaning_connection: jet源自法语'jeter'表示'投掷'，-sam为名词后缀，字面意思为'被扔出去的东西'

examples.sentence: Pirates often threw jetsam overboard when being chased by navy ships.
examples.sentence_zh: 海盗被海军追击时常把货物抛入海中。

examples.sentence: The captain ordered jetsam to lighten the ship during the storm.
examples.sentence_zh: 暴风雨中船长下令弃货以减轻船重。

examples.sentence: Beachcombers search for valuable jetsam after typhoons.
examples.sentence_zh: 台风过后，海滩拾荒者会寻找值钱的漂流货物。

examples.sentence: This antique vase was originally jetsam from a sunken merchant ship.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个古董花瓶原本是沉没商船的漂流物。

usages.meaning: 漂流残骸与弃货（常比喻无用杂物）

examples.sentence: His room was filled with flotsam and jetsam from thrift stores.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的房间堆满了二手店淘来的零碎杂物。

teach: jetsam是'海上断舍离'的产物🌊！想象泰坦尼克号把家具扔下船就成了jetsam（而flotsam是船自己散架的残骸）。海盗抛货叫jetsam，你扔前任礼物叫trash🗑️。搭配'jetsam hunter'指专业海滩寻宝人，'emotional jetsam'则比喻心灵垃圾🧠。记住：主动扔的=jetsam，被动飘的=flotsam！

tips: 谐音梗：'捷森'→快递捷森(jetsam)扔包裹
易混词对比：flotsam（被动漂浮物）vs jetsam（主动投弃物）
记忆口诀：Jettison（投弃）变jetsam，主动丢弃要记牢

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自法语'getaison'（抛掷动作），词根jet=投掷，-ison为古法语后缀

examples.sentence: The jettison of cargo saved the sinking ship during the typhoon.
examples.sentence_zh: 台风中投弃货物的行为拯救了正在下沉的船只。

examples.sentence: SpaceX's jettison of rocket stages is precisely timed.
examples.sentence_zh: SpaceX火箭的分离投弃行为经过精确计时。

examples.sentence: The beach was littered with jettison from the container ship.
examples.sentence_zh: 海滩上散落着集装箱船投弃的货物。

examples.sentence: Fishermen recovered valuable jettison floating near the reef.
examples.sentence_zh: 渔民在礁石附近打捞到有价值的投弃货物。

examples.sentence: The pilot activated emergency jettison of fuel tanks.
examples.sentence_zh: 飞行员启动了燃油箱的紧急抛投程序。

teach: jettison是'断舍离'的暴力版💥！古代商船遇险时，船长会喊'Jet-tison!'把茶叶丝绸扔下海🧳（像现代人清理微信收藏夹📁）。搭配'cargo jettison'像分手时扔前任礼物🎁，'data jettison'则是手机清内存🤳。记住：当你说要jettison旧物时，其实在cosplay加勒比海盗🏴‍☠️！

tips: 谐音梗：'接替神'→接替神明决定扔什么
易混词：abandon（完全放弃）vs jettison（策略性舍弃）
记忆tip：JET（喷射）+TISON（踢走）= 喷出去踢走

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自法语'jeter（投掷）'，指向外突出的建筑物

examples.sentence: Fishermen cast their lines from the jetty at dawn.
examples.sentence_zh: 渔民黎明时分在突堤上抛竿垂钓。

examples.sentence: The kids were jumping off the jetty into the sea.
examples.sentence_zh: 孩子们正从突堤上跳入海中。

examples.sentence: The jetty protected the harbor from typhoon waves.
examples.sentence_zh: 防波堤使港口免受台风巨浪侵袭。

examples.sentence: Seagulls love perching on the concrete jetty.
examples.sentence_zh: 海鸥喜欢停歇在混凝土防波堤上。

examples.sentence: The cruise ship slowly approached the passenger jetty.
examples.sentence_zh: 游轮缓缓驶向客运码头。

examples.sentence: We bought freshly caught squid at the fishing jetty.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在渔码头买了刚捕获的鱿鱼。

examples.sentence: Her jetty hair shone under the stage lights.
examples.sentence_zh: 她乌黑发亮的头发在舞台灯光下闪耀。

examples.sentence: The panther's jetty coat looked like liquid obsidian.
examples.sentence_zh: 黑豹乌黑发亮的皮毛如同流动的黑曜石。

examples.sentence: The new balcony jetties out over the street.
examples.sentence_zh: 新阳台向街道上方伸出。

examples.sentence: His chin jettied forward defiantly.
examples.sentence_zh: 他挑衅地向前伸出下巴。

examples.sentence: The jetty boat transfers supplies to anchored ships.
examples.sentence_zh: 码头工作船为停泊船只转运补给。

teach: jetty就是个海陆两栖单词🌊🏗️！作名词时像条伸进海里的舌头👅（防波堤），当形容词时变身黑寡妇的晚礼服🕷️（乌黑发亮），作动词时宛如长颈鹿伸脖子🦒（伸出）。搭配说'jetty light'（堤岸灯）和'jetty black'（墨黑色），吐槽某人固执可以说'stubborn as a concrete jetty'（像混凝土码头般顽固）💪⚓

tips: 视觉记忆：j+etty→' jet（喷射）'+'ty（堤）'→喷水堤坝
易混词对比：pier（观光码头）vs jetty（功能型堤岸）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自中古英语'giu', 拉丁语'Iudaeus', 希腊语'Ioudaios', 希伯来语'Yehudi'

examples.sentence: Einstein was a Jew who changed the world with his theories.
examples.sentence_zh: 爱因斯坦是改变世界的犹太裔科学家。

examples.sentence: The museum showcases 2000 years of Jew history in China.
examples.sentence_zh: 这座博物馆展示了犹太人在华的2000年历史。

examples.sentence: Don't be such a Jew with your birthday red packets!
examples.sentence_zh: 发生日红包别这么吝啬嘛！

examples.sentence: That Jew landlord charges for every drop of water.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个抠门房东连水滴都要计费。

examples.sentence: A Jew prays at the Wailing Wall in Jerusalem.
examples.sentence_zh: 犹太教徒在耶路撒冷哭墙前祈祷。

examples.sentence: Kosher food is prepared according to Jew dietary laws.
examples.sentence_zh: 洁食是根据犹太教饮食法规制作的。

examples.sentence: The tourist got jewed when buying 'authentic' terracotta warriors.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客购买'真品'兵马俑时被坑了。

examples.sentence: That antique dealer always tries to jew customers.
examples.sentence_zh: 那古董商总想欺诈顾客。

examples.sentence: She jewed the price down to half at the silk market.
examples.sentence_zh: 她在丝绸市场杀价到一半。

examples.sentence: My grandma can jew any vendor into giving discounts.
examples.sentence_zh: 我奶奶能让任何商贩打折。

examples.sentence: The ethnic musician played a Jew's harp with amazing skill.
examples.sentence_zh: 民乐演奏家用口弦琴展现惊人技艺。

teach: Jew这个词就像青铜神树🌳：作为民族称谓时代表智慧（爱因斯坦等犹太科学家💡），作为贬义时却变成'抠门鬼'的刻板印象（莎士比亚《威尼斯商人》里的夏洛克💸）。要特别注意：用作动词时带有冒犯性！地道表达'砍价高手'说haggler like a Persian bazaar merchant🕌，'吝啬鬼'更礼貌的说法是penny-pincher💰。

tips: 历史梗：中世纪欧洲禁止犹太人从事多数职业，只能放贷，形成'守财奴'偏见
易混词：Jewish（adj.）比Jew（n.）更正式礼貌
视觉联想：'Jew'里的'w'像烛台🕎，记住犹太光明节

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'jouel'，原指'玩耍的小物件'，后演变为贵重装饰品

examples.sentence: The crown jewels sparkled like trapped starlight.
examples.sentence_zh: 皇冠珠宝如同捕获的星光般闪耀。

examples.sentence: She wore traditional Miao silver jewels for her wedding.
examples.sentence_zh: 她婚礼时佩戴了苗族传统银饰。

examples.sentence: This handwritten recipe is the jewel of our family.
examples.sentence_zh: 这份手写食谱是我们家的传家宝。

examples.sentence: The panda is considered a living jewel of China.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫被视为中国的活体珍宝。

examples.sentence: The Forbidden City displays exquisite jewel hairpins.
examples.sentence_zh: 故宫陈列着精美的珠宝发簪。

examples.sentence: His jewel-encrusted belt buckle caught everyone's attention.
examples.sentence_zh: 他镶满宝石的皮带扣吸引了所有人的目光。

examples.sentence: The artisan jeweled the hairpin with freshwater pearls.
examples.sentence_zh: 匠人用淡水珍珠装饰这支发簪。

examples.sentence: Ancient Tibetans jeweled their prayer wheels with turquoise.
examples.sentence_zh: 藏族人用绿松石装饰转经筒。

examples.sentence: They jeweled the dragon sculpture with ruby eyes.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们给龙形雕塑镶嵌了红宝石眼睛。

examples.sentence: The imperial seal was jeweled with the finest jade.
examples.sentence_zh: 玉玺镶有最上等的和田玉。

usages.meaning: 皇冠上的明珠（喻最珍贵部分）

examples.sentence: The Terracotta Army is the jewel in China's cultural crown.
examples.sentence_zh: 兵马俑是中国文化皇冠上的明珠。

examples.sentence: The jewel thief disguised himself as a museum cleaner.
examples.sentence_zh: 珠宝大盗伪装成博物馆清洁工。

teach: jewel这个词自带BGM💎！想象商朝工匠在青铜器上镶嵌绿松石（jewel the ritual vessels），就像给手机贴水钻📱。说'传家宝'用family jewel会闹笑话（实际指男性生殖器），正确说法是heirloom jewel。搭配jewel box指首饰盒🎁，而jewel tone则是宝石色调的穿搭。记住：真正的jewel可能是你奶奶的翡翠镯子，也可能是你写满注释的《五年高考》📚！

tips: 谐音梗：'珠儿'→《还珠格格》里的小燕子就是活宝(jewel)
易混词：jewelry是珠宝总称，jewel是单件
记忆口诀：J=金 E=玉 W=王 E=耳 L=链

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根jewel=宝石，后缀-led表示'具有...的'→字面意思'具有宝石的'

examples.sentence: The queen's jewelled crown blinded the photographers.
examples.sentence_zh: 女王镶满宝石的王冠闪瞎了摄影师们的眼。

examples.sentence: Her jewelled phone case costs more than the phone itself.
examples.sentence_zh: 她那镶钻手机壳比手机本身还贵。

examples.sentence: The museum displays a jewelled dagger from Mughal era.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆展出一把莫卧儿时期的宝石匕首。

examples.sentence: He gifted her a jewelled hairpin shaped like a phoenix.
examples.sentence_zh: 他送了她一支凤凰造型的宝石发簪。

examples.sentence: The jewelled handle turned out to be fake crystals.
examples.sentence_zh: 那镶宝石的把手后来被发现是人造水晶。

examples.sentence: Bollywood stars often wear jewelled saris to award ceremonies.
examples.sentence_zh: 宝莱坞明星常穿镶宝石纱丽出席颁奖礼。

examples.sentence: The jewelled Easter eggs in Kremlin weigh over 50kg each.
examples.sentence_zh: 克里姆林宫那些饰有宝石的彩蛋每颗超50公斤。

examples.sentence: Ancient Chinese emperors wore jewelled hats with hanging pearls.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国古代皇帝戴的冕冠饰有宝石和垂珠。

examples.sentence: The Siberian husky's jewelled eyes glow in the dark.
examples.sentence_zh: 这只哈士奇宝石般的眼睛在黑暗中发光。

examples.sentence: Her speech was full of jewelled words but empty meaning.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的演讲满是华丽辞藻却空洞无物。

teach: jewelled这词自带土豪金特效✨！想象乾隆皇帝的百宝箱💎（jewelled cabinet），或是《泰坦尼克号》里那颗海洋之心🔵（jewelled necklace）。说'镶满宝石'用studded with gems更地道，比如'她的戒指镶满宝石'→Her ring is studded with gems。记住：真正的jewelled物品都能让安检仪哔哔响！🚨

tips: 谐音梗：'珠喂的'→用珠宝喂(jewelled)饱你的虚荣心
易混词：jewelled(镶宝石的) vs. jeweled(美式拼法)
记忆tip：想象把jewel(宝石)像乐高一样-led(拼接)

etymology.meaning_connection: jewel来自古法语'jouel'（玩具/珍宝），-er表示'从事...的人'→把珍宝当玩具的人

examples.sentence: The Saudi jeweller displayed emeralds the size of pigeon eggs.
examples.sentence_zh: 沙特宝石商展出了鸽子蛋大小的祖母绿。

examples.sentence: Ancient jewellers along the Silk Road traded gemstones for Chinese silk.
examples.sentence_zh: 丝绸之路上的古代宝石商用宝石换取中国丝绸。

examples.sentence: The royal jeweller spent 3 years carving the imperial jade seal.
examples.sentence_zh: 御用宝石匠耗时三年雕琢这方玉玺。

examples.sentence: Jewellers in Antwerp use lasers to cut diamonds with micron precision.
examples.sentence_zh: 安特卫普的宝石匠用激光切割钻石，精度达微米级。

examples.sentence: Tiffany's jewellers wear white gloves when handling engagement rings.
examples.sentence_zh: 蒂芙尼的珠宝商试戴婚戒时会佩戴白手套。

examples.sentence: The Wuhan jeweller created a gold mask inspired by Sanxingdui artifacts.
examples.sentence_zh: 武汉珠宝商参照三星堆文物打造了黄金面具。

examples.sentence: He spotted the synthetic diamond through his jeweller's loupe.
examples.sentence_zh: 他通过珠宝放大镜发现了这颗合成钻石。

examples.sentence: This antique silver teapot was polished with jeweller's rouge.
examples.sentence_zh: 这把古董银壶是用珠宝抛光粉打磨的。

teach: jeweller是点石成金的人🧙♂️！中世纪时宝石商(gem dealer)和造假者(counterfeiter)经常是同一个人🤫。要说'土豪'地道说法是bling bling guy💎，珠宝柜台叫jewellery counter就像龙宫的宝藏库🐉。记住：真正的jeweller能看出你戴的是真钻还是冰糖！

tips: 谐音梗：'珠儿乐'→珠宝匠看着珠子乐开花
易混词：jewellery(珠宝总称) vs. jeweller(从业者)

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根jewel=宝石，后缀-ery表集合→宝石的集合

examples.sentence: The crown contains jewellery from six different dynasties.
examples.sentence_zh: 这顶王冠镶嵌着来自六个朝代的宝石。

examples.sentence: Her engagement ring's jewellery glows like fireflies at night.
examples.sentence_zh: 她订婚戒指上的宝石夜晚会如萤火虫般发光。

examples.sentence: Tang Dynasty jewellery often featured golden phoenix designs.
examples.sentence_zh: 唐代贵重饰物常用金凤凰纹样。

examples.sentence: This antique jewellery box preserves 200-year-old hairpins.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个古董首饰盒保存着两百年前的贵重发簪。

examples.sentence: My grandma's handwritten recipes are family jewellery.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶手写的食谱是我们家的无价之宝。

examples.sentence: That stray cat became the neighborhood's living jewellery.
examples.sentence_zh: 那只流浪猫成了街坊们珍视的活宝贝。

examples.sentence: Her Douyin videos always feature trendy costume jewellery.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的抖音视频总戴着最新潮的时尚饰品。

examples.sentence: The jade bracelet is our family jewellery passed down from Qing Dynasty.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个玉镯是我们家从清朝传下来的传家宝。

teach: jewellery是'珠光宝气'💎的代言词！最早人类用贝壳当jewellery🐚（想想山顶洞人的兽牙项链），现在直播带货9块9包邮的也是jewellery📱。说'土豪'叫bling-bling（拟声词指金光闪闪），'传家宝'用heirloom jewellery就像故宫文物🏛️。记住：真正的jewellery不在价格，而在你戴它时眼里的光✨！

tips: 谐音梗：'珠儿乐'→珠宝(jewellery)让人快乐
易混词对比：jewelry（美式拼写）vs jewellery（英式拼写）

etymology.meaning_connection: Jew（犹太人）+阴性后缀-ess→特指犹太女性

examples.sentence: The novel describes a courageous Jewess during WWII.
examples.sentence_zh: 这部小说描写了二战期间一位勇敢的犹太女性。

examples.sentence: Golda Meir was the first Jewess to become a prime minister.
examples.sentence_zh: 果尔达·梅厄是首位成为总理的犹太女性。

teach: 词尾-ess是女性特供标签🏷️，就像actress（女演员）和goddess（女神）。不过要注意：现代英语倾向用Jewish woman代替Jewess，就像我们用'女医生'而非'医女'👩⚕️。地道表达'犹太家庭'叫Jewish household，搭配'守安息日'keep Sabbath和'光明节'Hanukkah🕎。

tips: 词缀记忆：-ess结尾常表女性，如princess（公主）
对比：Jew（泛指犹太人）→ Jewess（特指女性）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根Jew=犹太人，后缀-ish表'...的'→犹太人的

examples.sentence: The Jewish community in Shanghai has a history dating back to the 19th century.
examples.sentence_zh: 上海的犹太人社区历史可追溯至19世纪。

examples.sentence: Jewish humor often involves self-deprecating jokes about bagels.
examples.sentence_zh: 犹太幽默常包含关于贝果的自嘲笑话。

examples.sentence: The Jewish New Year features apples dipped in honey for sweetness.
examples.sentence_zh: 犹太新年传统包含用苹果蘸蜂蜜象征甜蜜。

examples.sentence: Jewish genealogy research often traces back to Eastern Europe.
examples.sentence_zh: 犹太族谱研究常可追溯至东欧地区。

examples.sentence: Hanukkah moves around on the Gregorian calendar because it follows the Jewish calendar.
examples.sentence_zh: 光明节在公历中的日期不固定，因其遵循犹太历。

usages.meaning: 典型犹太母亲（文化形象）

examples.sentence: The stereotype of a Jewish mother always offering food reflects cultural values.
examples.sentence_zh: 总爱劝人吃东西的犹太母亲形象反映了文化价值观。

teach: Jewish这个词自带文化压缩包📦！你知道吗？中世纪犹太商人发明了支票💸（避免携带现金被抢），'犹太妈妈'梗堪比中国的'你妈觉得你饿'🍗（Jewish mother syndrome）。要说'抠门'可以用tight as a Jewish violin🎻，但记住这其实是刻板印象！

tips: 谐音梗：'酒味石'→犹太人先祖摩西击石出酒的神迹
易混词：Jew(犹太人) vs. jute(黄麻)
联想记忆：ish结尾常表民族(English, Spanish)

etymology.meaning_connection: 词源不明，可能与古法语'giber'（摇晃）有关

examples.sentence: The sailor adjusted the jib to catch the morning breeze.
examples.sentence_zh: 水手调整船首三角帆以捕捉晨风。

examples.sentence: A colorful jib makes the sailboat look like a butterfly on water.
examples.sentence_zh: 彩色的三角帆让帆船像水面上的蝴蝶。

examples.sentence: The crane's jib swung dangerously close to the construction workers.
examples.sentence_zh: 起重机的铁臂危险地靠近建筑工人。

examples.sentence: Modern jibs can extend over 50 meters like mechanical giraffe necks.
examples.sentence_zh: 现代铁臂能伸出50多米，像机械长颈鹿的脖子。

examples.sentence: The camera jibbed smoothly to capture the sunset.
examples.sentence_zh: 摄像机平稳移转拍摄日落。

examples.sentence: His eyes jibbed between the menu and the waitress nervously.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的眼睛在菜单和服务员之间紧张地游移。

examples.sentence: The horse jibbed at jumping over the muddy ditch.
examples.sentence_zh: 马匹在泥沟前踌躇不敢跳跃。

examples.sentence: She jibbed when asked to sing karaoke in public.
examples.sentence_zh: 被要求在公开场合唱卡拉OK时她退缩了。

examples.sentence: The project jibbed due to lack of funding.
examples.sentence_zh: 项目因资金不足停滞不前。

examples.sentence: Conversation jibbed awkwardly when politics was mentioned.
examples.sentence_zh: 当提到政治时，谈话尴尬地停止了。

examples.sentence: I don't like the cut of his jib - he seems dishonest.
examples.sentence_zh: 我不喜欢他的做派——看起来不诚实。

teach: jib是个会'变脸'的单词🎭！作名词时是帆船的头饰🎀（三角帆）和起重机的机械臂🤖；作动词时像犹豫的马儿🐎（jib at jumping），像卡住的进度条📊（project jibbed），还像拍电影时的运镜🎥（camera jibbed）。搭配'the cut of one's jib'形容人就像看帆船识别国籍🚩。遇到困难'卡住'可以说hit a snag（被树根绊住）！

tips: 谐音梗：'急步'→急步(jib)走到半路突然停止
易混词对比：jib/jab（轻击）/job
记忆：帆(jib)+臂(jib)=J形状的船部件

etymology.meaning_connection: 词源不详，可能与古法语'giber'（粗暴对待）有关，后衍生出'嘲笑'和'（航海）转帆'两种含义

examples.sentence: Netizens jibed at the influencer's failed mukbang livestream.
examples.sentence_zh: 网友嘲笑了该网红翻车的吃播直播。

examples.sentence: His classmates jibed when he wore hanfu to the prom.
examples.sentence_zh: 当他穿汉服参加毕业舞会时，同学们发出了嘲笑。

examples.sentence: The witness's account didn't jibe with the surveillance video.
examples.sentence_zh: 目击者的陈述与监控录像不一致。

examples.sentence: His actions jibe perfectly with Confucian teachings.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的行为与儒家教义完全一致。

examples.sentence: The captain jibed the sails to catch the changing wind.
examples.sentence_zh: 船长转动船帆以顺应变化的风向。

examples.sentence: Jibing requires precise coordination during the regatta.
examples.sentence_zh: 赛艇比赛中转帆需要精确配合。

examples.sentence: They jibed him mercilessly about his Sichuan accent.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们无情地嘲笑他的四川口音。

examples.sentence: The talk show host jibed politicians with rap lyrics.
examples.sentence_zh: 脱口秀主持人用rap歌词嘲笑政客。

examples.sentence: His TikTok dance became the target of good-natured jibes.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的抖音舞蹈成了善意的嘲笑对象。

examples.sentence: The jibes about '996 work culture' went viral on Weibo.
examples.sentence_zh: 关于'996工作制'的嘲笑在微博疯传。

examples.sentence: The DNA results jibed with the family legend.
examples.sentence_zh: DNA检测结果与家族传说一致。

examples.sentence: The comedian took a jibe at cryptocurrency scams.
examples.sentence_zh: 喜剧演员嘲讽了加密货币骗局。

teach: jibe是航海界和键盘侠的共同语言⚓💻！当它表示'转帆'时像抖音网红突然转向蹭热度🔄；表示'嘲笑'时像B站弹幕疯狂玩梗😂；'一致'的含义则像健康码与行程码终于合二为一✅。记住：海上转帆叫jibe，网上吐槽也叫jibe！

tips: 谐音梗：'债不'→欠债不还(jibe)被嘲笑
易混词对比：jibe（嘲笑/一致）vs. gibe（同义）vs. jive（摇摆舞）
记忆口诀：帆动(jibe)嘴毒(jibe)，数据符(jibe with)

etymology.meaning_connection: 18世纪俚语，可能来自盗贼黑话'flash of lightning（闪电）'的变体

examples.sentence: Your WeChat transfer arrived in a jiffy!
examples.sentence_zh: 你的微信转账瞬间到账！

examples.sentence: The hotpot broth boiled dry in a jiffy during our intense mahjong game.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们打麻将太投入，火锅汤底瞬间烧干了。

examples.sentence: The Didi driver said he'd pick us up in a jiffy.
examples.sentence_zh: 滴滴司机说他马上来接我们。

examples.sentence: I'll finish this spicy crayfish in a jiffy!
examples.sentence_zh: 我马上就能干掉这份麻辣小龙虾！

teach: jiffy是比'眨眼间👀'还快的单位⚡！这个词源自18世纪英国黑话，就像现代人说'秒杀'。有趣的是：1）物理学家真的用'jiffy'作为时间单位=0.01秒 2）说'马上到'可以拍胸脯保证：Be there in a jiffy! 比'五分钟'可信多了⌛ 3）搭配记忆：快递小哥的jiffy bag（快件袋）📦+ jiffy marker（快速记号笔）🖍️

tips: 谐音梗：'急飞'→急飞(jiffy)般的速度
易混词对比：moment（文艺范的片刻）vs jiffy（市井感的刹那）
视觉联想：闪电+沙漏+外卖小哥三合一图标

etymology.meaning_connection: 16世纪源自法语gigue（一种舞曲），可能拟声化自跳跃节奏

examples.sentence: The Irish dancers performed a lively jig at the pub.
examples.sentence_zh: 爱尔兰舞者在酒馆跳起欢快的吉格舞。

examples.sentence: Her feet tapped out the rhythm of the jig involuntarily.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的脚不由自主跟着吉格舞曲打起节拍。

examples.sentence: He caught three trouts using a fluorescent jig.
examples.sentence_zh: 他用荧光拟饵钓钩钓到三条鳟鱼。

examples.sentence: The fishing jig mimics injured baitfish.
examples.sentence_zh: 这种钓钩模拟受伤的小鱼。

examples.sentence: The carpenter secured the wood with a dovetail jig.
examples.sentence_zh: 木匠用燕尾榫夹具固定木材。

examples.sentence: This 3D-printed jig ensures drill holes are perfectly aligned.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个3D打印夹具确保钻孔位置完全对齐。

examples.sentence: Puppies jig around when they see leash.
examples.sentence_zh: 小狗看见牵绳会兴奋地乱跳。

examples.sentence: The TikTok challenge made people jig with one leg.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个抖音挑战让人单腿蹦跳。

examples.sentence: We jigged for squid under the neon lights.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在霓虹灯下用拟饵钓鱿鱼。

examples.sentence: Japanese anglers jig for giant tuna in deep sea.
examples.sentence_zh: 日本钓手在深海用拟饵钓巨型金枪鱼。

examples.sentence: When mom found cookie crumbs, the jig was up.
examples.sentence_zh: 妈妈发现饼干屑时，把戏就穿帮了。

examples.sentence: Doing jig saw puzzles trains spatial cognition.
examples.sentence_zh: 玩拼图能训练空间认知能力。

teach: jig是舞蹈届的兔子舞🐰+钓鱼界的奥斯卡影帝🎣！爱尔兰人跳jig像踢踏舞踩电门⚡，钓鱼jig则是会跳钢管舞的鱼钩——底部铅锤让鱼饵妖娆扭动💃。记住：'the jig is up'不是舞跳完了，而是东窗事发🚨！说'手舞足蹈'可叫dance a jig，夹具jig则是工业界的机械舞者🛠️。

tips: 谐音梗：'急个'→跳吉格舞要急个节奏
易混词：gig（演出）/jig（舞蹈）

etymology.meaning_connection: jig指快速往复运动，saw是锯子→描述锯齿上下快速运动的工具

examples.sentence: The carpenter cut intricate patterns with a jigsaw.
examples.sentence_zh: 木匠用线锯切割出复杂花纹。

examples.sentence: This DIY kit includes a mini jigsaw for children.
examples.sentence_zh: 这款手工套装包含儿童迷你线锯。

examples.sentence: He jigsawed the plywood into panda shapes.
examples.sentence_zh: 他把胶合板锯成熊猫形状。

examples.sentence: We need to jigsaw this metal sheet carefully.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要小心地用线锯切割这块金属板。

examples.sentence: The 5000-piece jigsaw puzzle depicts the Great Wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 这幅5000片的拼图展现长城景观。

teach: jigsaw是工具界的抖音达人📱——上下疯狂运动（jig）的锯子（saw）！拼图游戏叫jigsaw puzzle就像把人生锯成碎片再拼回🧩。'精确切割'说jigsaw cut像外科手术⚡，'杂乱无章'叫jigsaw chaos就像被锯烂的木板🗑️。记住：每个jigsaw cut都在雕刻你的生活形状！

tips: 谐音梗：'急个骚'→急着锯（jig saw）木头手被骚（划伤）
易混词对比：chainsaw（电锯）是狂暴版，jigsaw是优雅版

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自阿拉伯语'jahada'（奋斗），伊斯兰教术语

examples.sentence: The medieval texts described jihad as a defensive war against invaders.
examples.sentence_zh: 中世纪文献将讨伐异教徒描述为对抗入侵者的防御战。

examples.sentence: Misinterpretations of jihad have caused historical conflicts.
examples.sentence_zh: 对讨伐异教徒的误解曾引发历史冲突。

examples.sentence: His personal jihad is promoting educational equality.
examples.sentence_zh: 他个人的拥护运动是推动教育平等。

examples.sentence: The environmental jihad gained global supporters.
examples.sentence_zh: 这场环保拥护运动获得了全球支持者。

examples.sentence: The concept of holy jihad is often politicized.
examples.sentence_zh: 圣战概念常被政治化。

teach: jihad就像语言界的榴莲🍈：原意是'精神奋斗'（如戒奶茶的jihad），却被刻板印象裹挟成危险词汇💣。记住：'内部jihad'指自我提升（如学霸的考试jihad📚），'外部jihad'才涉及武力。搭配'holy jihad'要慎用，就像榴莲别在电梯里吃🚫！

tips: 文化提示：90%的现代穆斯林用jihad指代克服懒惰等个人奋斗
易混词：crusade（基督教圣战）

etymology.meaning_connection: 拟声词，模拟轻微晃动时发出的声响

examples.sentence: She jiggled the key in the lock like shaking a tambourine.
examples.sentence_zh: 她像摇铃鼓一样轻晃钥匙开锁。

examples.sentence: The bartender jiggles the cocktail shaker with hip-hop rhythm.
examples.sentence_zh: 调酒师用嘻哈节奏轻摇调酒器。

examples.sentence: My phone jiggles on the desk when notifications come.
examples.sentence_zh: 通知来时我的手机会在桌上微微震动。

examples.sentence: The jelly jiggles like TikTok dance challenges.
examples.sentence_zh: 果冻的颤动像抖音舞蹈挑战。

examples.sentence: Give the handle a playful jiggle to open this ancient cabinet.
examples.sentence_zh: 给把手来个俏皮的轻摇就能打开这个古董柜。

examples.sentence: The bunny's nose has an adorable jiggle when it chews.
examples.sentence_zh: 兔子咀嚼时鼻子会可爱地轻颤。

examples.sentence: Engineers do the jiggle test for USB ports - if it falls out, redesign!
examples.sentence_zh: 工程师对USB接口进行抖动测试——如果会松脱就重设计！

teach: jiggle是'摇摆界的小碎步'💃：想象奶茶里的珍珠轻微晃动🧋，或是手机收到男神消息时的震动📱。要说'抖得厉害'可以说jiggle like jelly（像果冻般颤动），'轻微调整'叫give it a jiggle（轻轻摇下）。记住：jiggle的幅度就像微信'拍一拍'的震动强度！

tips: 谐音梗：'鸡狗'→鸡狗打架时羽毛轻晃(jiggle)
易混词对比：wiggle(大幅摆动) vs jiggle(微幅颤动)
记忆tip：J形状像弹簧颤动轨迹

etymology.meaning_connection: 词源不明，可能源自方言，17世纪起表示'突然抛弃爱人'

examples.sentence: In the TV drama, the wealthy jilt left his fiancee at the altar.
examples.sentence_zh: 电视剧里那个富有的负心汉在婚礼现场抛弃了未婚妻。

examples.sentence: The novel's protagonist is a notorious jilt who breaks hearts across Europe.
examples.sentence_zh: 小说主角是个在欧洲到处留情又抛弃对方的臭名昭著之人。

examples.sentence: She jilted her boyfriend after finding his WeChat full of dating app notifications.
examples.sentence_zh: 发现男友微信里全是交友软件通知后，她果断甩了他。

examples.sentence: The singer got jilted minutes before livestreaming their wedding.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位歌手在直播婚礼前几分钟被放鸽子了。

teach: jilt是爱情里的急刹车🚗💔！它专指'在认真关系中突然抛弃对方'，比ghost（玩失踪）更伤人。英国有'jilted lover's lane'地名，源自被抛弃者的夜半哭泣🌙😭。搭配'jilt at the altar'（婚礼现场抛弃）比'分手'更戏剧化，说'被甩'可以用dumped like yesterday's takeout（像隔夜外卖被扔掉）🍱🗑️

tips: 谐音梗：'揪疼'→被抛弃时心揪着疼
易混词对比：abandon（彻底放弃任何事物）vs jilt（特指情感抛弃）
记忆tip：字母J像钩子→把爱人钩来又甩掉

etymology.meaning_connection: jilt可能源自中古荷兰语'jillen'（戏弄）+过去分词后缀-ed→字面指'被戏弄的'，特指感情欺骗

examples.sentence: The jilted groom livestreamed his breakup on Douyin.
examples.sentence_zh: 被抛弃的新郎在抖音直播了自己的分手过程。

examples.sentence: She felt jilted when her boyfriend ghosted her after borrowing her Pinduoduo discount code.
examples.sentence_zh: 当男友借走她的拼多多优惠券后玩消失，她感到被抛弃了。

examples.sentence: The viral video shows a bride jilting her groom at the altar with a mic drop.
examples.sentence_zh: 热搜视频显示新娘在婚礼现场扔掉话筒抛弃新郎。

teach: jilted是爱情修罗场💔的专属词！源自17世纪英国'jilt'（感情骗子），就像现代'海王'突然拉黑你📱。被分手可以说dumped（像垃圾被扔），但jilted特指'临门一脚被甩'🏹。搭配'left in the lurch'（被晾在尴尬境地），emo精准三连：🤡👋💸

tips: 谐音梗：'急跳的'→急得跳脚的被甩者
易混词对比：abandon（彻底放弃） vs jilted（情感背叛）

etymology.meaning_connection: 拟声词起源，模拟金属碰撞的清脆声响

examples.sentence: The jingle of wind chimes reminded her of childhood summers.
examples.sentence_zh: 风铃的叮当声让她想起童年的夏天。

examples.sentence: Santa's sleigh is always associated with the jingle of bells.
examples.sentence_zh: 圣诞老人的雪橇总伴随着铃铛的叮当声。

examples.sentence: She jingled her keys to find them in the dark.
examples.sentence_zh: 她在黑暗中晃动钥匙串发出叮当声来寻找它们。

examples.sentence: The camel caravan jingled its bells across the desert.
examples.sentence_zh: 骆驼商队晃着铃铛穿越沙漠发出叮当声。

examples.sentence: The ice cubes jingled in the glass as he walked.
examples.sentence_zh: 他走动时冰块在玻璃杯里叮当作响。

examples.sentence: Change jingled in his pocket with every step.
examples.sentence_zh: 他每走一步口袋里的零钱就叮当作响。

examples.sentence: The poet jingled words like musical notes.
examples.sentence_zh: 诗人像编排音符般让文字押韵。

examples.sentence: Preschool teachers often jingle nursery rhymes with clapping.
examples.sentence_zh: 幼儿园老师常用拍手让童谣押韵。

usages.meaning: 一路叮当响（圣诞歌曲名）

examples.sentence: We sang Jingle Bells while the sleigh jingled all the way.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们唱着《铃儿响叮当》，雪橇一路叮咚作响。

examples.sentence: The Oreo jingle gets stuck in people's heads easily.
examples.sentence_zh: 奥利奥广告歌很容易让人上头。

teach: jingle是声音界的表情包🎵！从驯鹿铃铛🔔到奶茶店门铃，从支付宝到账提示音💸到脑白金循环神曲，甚至你跺jiojio时口袋钥匙的响声🔑都算！广告歌叫catchy jingle（魔性广告歌），零钱叮当响可说chump change（小钱），记住：好的jingle能让脑细胞单曲循环三天三夜！

tips: 谐音梗：'金钩'→圣诞袜上的金钩(jingle)叮当响
易混词：jangle刺耳金属声 vs jingle清脆声响
记忆tip：J开头的拟声词都轻快（jump, joy, jazz）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自19世纪英国歌曲《我们不想打仗》副歌'by jingo'（天哪），-ism表主义→好战言论演变为沙文主义

examples.sentence: The politician's jingoism was evident when he declared 'Our tanks will drink their oil!'
examples.sentence_zh: 当该政客宣称'我们的坦克要喝干他们的石油'时，其侵略主义昭然若揭。

examples.sentence: Historical jingoism often disguises itself as patriotism, like wrapping dumplings with propaganda leaflets.
examples.sentence_zh: 历史上的侵略主义常伪装成爱国主义，就像用宣传单包饺子。

examples.sentence: The superpower's jingoism manifests in forcing small countries to use its social media apps.
examples.sentence_zh: 该超级大国的沙文主义体现在强迫小国使用其社交媒体应用。

examples.sentence: Calling mooncakes 'universal snacks' is culinary jingoism at Mid-Autumn Festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 宣称月饼是'宇宙通用点心'堪称中秋节的饮食沙文主义。

examples.sentence: Tweeting missile emojis is the digital version of nuclear jingoism.
examples.sentence_zh: 发导弹表情包是数字时代的核武恫吓主义。

teach: jingoism是'键盘侠的军功章'🎖️：源自1878年英国歌谣'by jingo'（好家伙），就像现在弹幕刷'虽远必诛'💻。搭配'beer-fueled jingoism'（啤酒吹出来的爱国）和'keyboard jingoism'（键盘征伐）。说'瞎逞能'可用all bark and no bite🐶，记住：真正的爱国不是把地球仪涂成自家国旗色🌍！

tips: 谐音梗：'金戈ism'→挥舞金戈的主义
易混词：patriotism（爱国）-jingoism（爱国贼）
联想：Jingo发音像京剧'净角'，画着主战脸谱🎭

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自1878年英国音乐厅歌曲'By Jingo!'（表示好战情绪），-ist表人，-ic表性质→形容极端爱国主义

examples.sentence: The politician's jingoistic speech made the UN delegates frown.
examples.sentence_zh: 政客强硬外交政策的发言让联合国代表们皱眉。

examples.sentence: Jingoistic trade policies often backfire like expired firecrackers.
examples.sentence_zh: 强硬外交政策的贸易措施常如过期炮竹般适得其反。

examples.sentence: Some netizens criticized the jingoistic comments under the news.
examples.sentence_zh: 部分网民批评新闻下的侵略分子言论。

examples.sentence: His jingoistic worldview belongs in the 19th century.
examples.sentence_zh: 他侵略分子的世界观还停留在19世纪。

examples.sentence: The live-streamer's jingoistic rhetoric was immediately fact-checked.
examples.sentence_zh: 主播的沙文主义论调立刻被事实核查。

teach: jingoistic本质是'键盘侠爱国主义'💻🔥！源自维多利亚时期酒馆歌曲'By Jingo!'（类似'我跟你拼了'的醉汉叫嚣）。要说'战狼外交'可以说wolf-warrior diplomacy🐺，'爱国贼'则是patriotic thief。记住：真正的爱国像煮饺子——要有包容的胸怀🥟！

tips: 谐音梗：'金狗istic'→土豪金狗叫嚣主义
易混词对比：patriotic（爱国） vs jingoistic（极端爱国）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自17世纪美国英语jynx（巫术），可能模仿巫术咒语发音

examples.sentence: That black cat is considered a jinx in Chinese culture.
examples.sentence_zh: 在中国文化中黑猫被视为不祥物。

examples.sentence: Don't say 'we'll win for sure' - that's a classic jinx!
examples.sentence_zh: 别说'我们肯定赢'，这是经典立flag行为！

examples.sentence: There's a jinx on our team - we've lost 10 games in a row.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们队中了邪，已经连输10场。

examples.sentence: Breaking a mirror brings 7 years of jinx according to superstition.
examples.sentence_zh: 迷信说法打碎镜子会带来7年厄运。

examples.sentence: You jinxed our fishing trip by saying 'we won't catch anything'!
examples.sentence_zh: 你说'我们钓不到鱼'，这下真被你咒到了！

examples.sentence: The commentator jinxed the player by praising his perfect record.
examples.sentence_zh: 解说员夸该选手纪录完美，结果立刻翻车。

examples.sentence: Fans believe the rival team put a jinx on our stadium.
examples.sentence_zh: 球迷认为对手给我们的球场下了咒。

usages.form: Jinx! You owe me a cola!
usages.meaning: 同步说同样话时的解咒用语

examples.sentence: When we both said 'hotpot' simultaneously, she shouted 'Jinx!'
examples.sentence_zh: 当我们同时说'火锅'时，她大喊'解咒咒语！'

teach: jinx是西方版'乌鸦嘴'🦉！古代女巫用jynx鸟施法（所以叫jinx），就像中国'说曹操曹操到'📜。要说'毒奶'可以用curse of commentary（解说诅咒），'立flag'叫tempt fate🎋。记住：当朋友说'我从不丢手机'时，快喊Jinx!防毒奶！

tips: 谐音梗：'金克死'→金属克星导致厄运
易混词：hex（巫术诅咒）/curse（普通诅咒）
记忆口诀：J开头+inx结尾=禁忌(in-x)组合

etymology.meaning_connection: jitter原指'震颤'（如咖啡因导致的颤抖），后缀-y表形容词→像喝了十杯咖啡般坐立不安的状态

examples.sentence: The panda became jittery when it heard fireworks during the Spring Festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 这只熊猫春节听到烟花声时变得极度不安。

examples.sentence: Her hands were jittery like a vibrating smartphone when presenting to the CEO.
examples.sentence_zh: 她向CEO汇报时双手颤抖得像开了震动的手机。

teach: jittery其实是'咖啡成精'☕️！源自咖啡因过量导致的颤抖(jitters)，现在形容紧张得像第一次见丈母娘👩🦳或考试前刷夜🌙。搭配'jittery voice'（抖音嗓）、'jittery legs'（抖腿症），地道说法是have butterflies in stomach（肚子里有蝴蝶🦋）。记住：你不是jittery，你只是人体震动模式启动了！

tips: 谐音梗：'急得要死(jittery)'→紧张到原地去世
易混词对比：nervous（常规紧张） vs jittery（物理性颤抖）

etymology.meaning_connection: 1920年代非裔美国人俚语，原指摇摆乐中的即兴对话，后衍生出'虚假言辞'的含义

examples.sentence: The jive at the Harlem club made everyone tap their feet.
examples.sentence_zh: 哈莱姆俱乐部的摇摆乐让所有人都不自觉打起节拍。

examples.sentence: Her vintage dress swirled perfectly with the jive's rhythm.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的复古裙摆随着摇摆乐的节奏完美旋转。

examples.sentence: Grandpa still wins jive competitions at the senior center.
examples.sentence_zh: 爷爷仍在老年活动中心的摇摆舞比赛中夺冠。

examples.sentence: The TikTok challenge mixes hip-hop with classic jive moves.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个抖音挑战将街舞与经典摇摆舞步结合。

examples.sentence: His excuse about the dog eating homework was pure jive.
examples.sentence_zh: 他关于狗吃了作业的借口纯属鬼扯。

examples.sentence: Don't feed me that jive - I saw you at the karaoke bar!
examples.sentence_zh: 别跟我扯谎——我在ktv看见你了！

examples.sentence: The couple jived so wildly they knocked over a speaker.
examples.sentence_zh: 这对情侣跳摇摆舞太嗨，撞翻了一个音响。

examples.sentence: After three cocktails, even the CEO was jiving with interns.
examples.sentence_zh: 三杯鸡尾酒下肚，连CEO都和实习生跳起了摇摆舞。

examples.sentence: He's jiving about his crypto investments again.
examples.sentence_zh: 他又在吹嘘自己根本不存在的加密货币投资。

examples.sentence: That influencer totally jived us with her 'natural' photos.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个网红用'纯天然'照片把我们忽悠惨了。

examples.sentence: Her jive apology didn't fool anyone after the scandal.
examples.sentence_zh: 丑闻后她假惺惺的道歉骗不了任何人。

examples.sentence: Those jive designer bags are sold in back alleys.
examples.sentence_zh: 那些假名牌包在后巷偷偷售卖。

examples.sentence: Car salesmen's jive talk couldn't convince my frugal dad.
examples.sentence_zh: 汽车销售的花言巧语说服不了我节俭的老爸。

examples.sentence: That jive turkey promised me concert tickets but vanished.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个骗子承诺给我演唱会门票后就消失了。

teach: jive是语言界的变色龙🦎！最初是让白人瞠目的爵士黑话🎷，后来变成骗子的套路话术🤥（jive talk）。说人'满嘴jive'比liar更带swag～搭配'jive turkey'使用瞬间穿越1970年代🕺。记住：当舞蹈是自由，当谎言是jive！

tips: 谐音梗：'斋舞'→吃斋念佛突然跳起摇摆舞
易混词：jive(带音乐性欺骗) vs jazz(纯粹音乐)
记忆tip：想象跳着舞说谎的人→舞步越炫，话越不可信

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自中古英语jobbe，原指'零碎工作'，可能拟声自咀嚼声（如做琐事时的碎碎念）

examples.sentence: His dream job is testing bubble tea flavors for a living.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的理想工作是靠品尝奶茶口味谋生。

examples.sentence: Working as a panda keeper is considered the happiest job in China.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫饲养员被认为是中国最幸福的工作。

examples.sentence: I picked up some odd jobs delivering spicy crayfish during summer break.
examples.sentence_zh: 暑假我接了送麻辣小龙虾的零活。

examples.sentence: Grandma pays neighborhood kids small jobs like walking her Pomeranian.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶付钱让邻居小孩做些遛博美犬之类的小零活。

examples.sentence: Douyin influencer has become a trendy job among Gen-Z.
examples.sentence_zh: 抖音网红已成为Z世代的热门职业。

examples.sentence: In ancient times, the emperor's food taster was a high-risk job.
examples.sentence_zh: 在古代，皇帝的试毒官是个高危职业。

examples.sentence: Fixing the Great Wall was quite a job for ancient laborers.
examples.sentence_zh: 修长城对古代劳工来说是件大工程。

examples.sentence: Convincing my cat to take a bath is always a tough job.
examples.sentence_zh: 说服我家猫洗澡永远是件难事。

examples.sentence: He jobbed around college towns as a bubble tea bartender.
examples.sentence_zh: 他在大学城周边做奶茶调饮师的零工。

examples.sentence: Many retirees job as tour guides showing foreign visitors around hutongs.
examples.sentence_zh: 许多退休人员做带外国游客逛胡同的零工。

examples.sentence: She jobbed backstage at Peking Opera theaters during summer.
examples.sentence_zh: 暑假她在京剧剧院后台打杂。

examples.sentence: Celebrity assistants often start by jobbing for their stars' pets.
examples.sentence_zh: 明星助理往往从给明星的宠物打杂开始。

examples.sentence: Antique dealers job rare porcelain for collectors.
examples.sentence_zh: 古董商为收藏家代客买卖稀有瓷器。

examples.sentence: He jobs limited-edition sneakers for wealthy clients.
examples.sentence_zh: 他为富裕客户代购限量版球鞋。

examples.sentence: The merchant jobbed tourists with fake 'ancient' coins.
examples.sentence_zh: 商人用假'古'钱币欺骗游客。

examples.sentence: Be careful not to get jobbed when buying jade at flea markets.
examples.sentence_zh: 在跳蚤市场买玉时要小心别被骗。

examples.sentence: College students often take odd jobs like tutoring or food delivery.
examples.sentence_zh: 大学生常做家教或送外卖之类的零工。

examples.sentence: Her side job selling handmade dumplings on WeChat is more profitable than her main job.
examples.sentence_zh: 她在微信卖手工饺子的副业比主业还赚钱。

teach: job这个词就像打工人百宝箱🧰！当n.时：正经工作叫9-to-5 job（朝九晚五），零活叫odd job（比如代排队买奶茶🥤）；当vi.时：打零工说moonlighting（月光下兼职🌙）；当vt.时：坑蒙拐骗叫pull a job（像《让子弹飞》里的假师爷🎩）。地道吐槽：'工作太多'说up to my eyeballs in work（工作淹没到眼球）💼

tips: 谐音梗：'脚不'→脚不沾地忙工作
易混词：career（长期职业）vs job（具体工作）
记忆法：J.O.B = Just Over Broke（刚好不破产）

etymology.meaning_connection: job表示'工作'，后缀-less表示'没有'→字面意思就是'没有工作的'

examples.sentence: The jobless teacher forgot to assign homework for three weeks.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个失职的老师连续三周忘记布置作业。

examples.sentence: His jobless behavior caused the company to lose a major client.
examples.sentence_zh: 他失职的行为导致公司失去了一位重要客户。

examples.sentence: After graduation, he was jobless for six months before finding his dream career.
examples.sentence_zh: 毕业后他无职业状态持续了半年，才找到理想工作。

examples.sentence: The jobless artist survived by selling paintings on the street.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位无职业的艺术家靠街头卖画为生。

examples.sentence: The government launched a training program for the jobless.
examples.sentence_zh: 政府为失业人群启动了培训计划。

teach: jobless就像被踢出工作群的打工人💼！古罗马失业者会去公共浴场蹭WiFi（误）🛁，现代说法是'between jobs'（职场空窗期）。搭配'jobless growth'（无就业增长）就像只长个子不长肉的竹子🎋，地道吐槽'啃老'叫boomerang kids（回力镖子女）🪃。记住：job+less=双倍忧伤😭！

tips: 谐音梗：'脚不累死'→失业(jobless)后逛街脚不累
易混词对比：unemployed（正式统计用） vs jobless（口语化）

etymology.meaning_connection: job=工作，less=无...的，ness=名词后缀→字面义为'无工作状态'

examples.sentence: The pandemic caused a sharp rise in joblessness worldwide.
examples.sentence_zh: 疫情导致全球失业率急剧上升。

examples.sentence: Some livestreamers turned their joblessness into content creation opportunities.
examples.sentence_zh: 有些主播将失业状态转化为内容创作机遇。

examples.sentence: The construction team complained about joblessness during rainy seasons.
examples.sentence_zh: 施工队在雨季抱怨无活可干。

examples.sentence: Retirees often experience joblessness differently from laid-off workers.
examples.sentence_zh: 退休者的无活可干状态与被裁员者截然不同。

teach: joblessness就像被踢出微信工作群的🚫📱，现代版'长安米贵居大不易'！在TikTok上搜索#joblessness会发现全球打工人共克时艰💼🔥，搭配'啃老'说live off parents like a koala🐨，'灵活就业'叫gig economy就像开滴滴接单🚗。记住：joblessness是名词，要吐槽得说'I'm jobless'才够痛！

tips: 谐音梗：'脚不乐事'→失业后脚都不乐意出门
易混词：unemployment（正式统计用词）vs joblessness（口语化）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自苏格兰盖尔语'seoc'（年轻人）,后演变为对运动员的俚语称呼

examples.sentence: The jocks in kilts guarded Edinburgh Castle fiercely.
examples.sentence_zh: 穿苏格兰裙的高地士兵们英勇守卫爱丁堡城堡。

examples.sentence: Braveheart's army included many barefoot jocks.
examples.sentence_zh: 《勇敢的心》军队中有许多赤脚的高地士兵。

examples.sentence: The jocks were practicing slam dunks when the library burned down.
examples.sentence_zh: 图书馆着火时这些运动员还在练习扣篮。

examples.sentence: Harvard jocks have higher GPAs than you think.
examples.sentence_zh: 哈佛运动员的绩点比你想的要高。

examples.sentence: Jock Stein is a legendary Scottish football manager.
examples.sentence_zh: 乔克·斯坦是苏格兰传奇足球教练。

examples.sentence: My uncle Jock always brings haggis to family gatherings.
examples.sentence_zh: 我的乔克叔叔总带哈吉斯参加家庭聚会。

examples.sentence: After the marathon, he got jock itch from sweaty shorts.
examples.sentence_zh: 马拉松后他因短裤潮湿得了股癣。

teach: jock这词就像苏格兰威士忌🥃+运动饮料🏀的混合体！最初指穿裙子的高地战士👨‍🦰（想象《勇敢的心》），现在变成美国大学里穿运动裤的壮汉💪。要说'肌肉发达没脑子'可以叫jock brain🧠（字面意思：运动员大脑），'体育特长生'可说varsity jock🎓。记住：真正的jock既能扔铅球也能吃羊杂碎布丁！

tips: 谐音梗：'酱克'→运动员(jock)浑身肌肉像酱牛肉
易混词：jack（千斤顶）/joke（笑话）
记忆tip：字母J像曲棍球杆，OCK像运动鞋

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自苏格兰语名字Jock（即John的昵称），-ey表小称→原指身材矮小的骑师，后衍生出'操控'含义

examples.sentence: The jockey in rainbow silks shouted 'Giddyap!' in Cantonese.
examples.sentence_zh: 穿着彩虹绸衣的骑师用粤语喊着'驾！'

examples.sentence: Hong Kong Jockey Club hosts the world's richest horse races.
examples.sentence_zh: 香港赛马会举办全球奖金最高的赛马赛事

examples.sentence: The forklift jockey stacked containers like Tetris blocks.
examples.sentence_zh: 叉车驾驶员像玩俄罗斯方块般堆叠集装箱

examples.sentence: E-scooter jockeys weave through Beijing hutongs like Kung Fu masters.
examples.sentence_zh: 电动滑板车骑手像功夫大师般穿行北京胡同

examples.sentence: They jockeyed the stock prices with fake news about dumpling shortages.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们用'饺子短缺'的假消息操纵股价

examples.sentence: Tourist traps jockey visitors into buying overpriced 'antique' teapots.
examples.sentence_zh: 旅游陷阱忽悠游客购买天价'古董'茶壶

examples.sentence: Delivery drivers jockey for parking spots outside hotpot restaurants.
examples.sentence_zh: 外卖骑手在火锅店外争夺停车位

examples.sentence: Startups jockey to get investments during the Spring Festival bonus season.
examples.sentence_zh: 初创公司在春节红包季争夺投资

examples.sentence: Live-streamers jockey for position during Singles' Day sales.
examples.sentence_zh: 主播们在双十一大促时抢占黄金时段

examples.sentence: The DJ jockeyed between Mandarin pop and Tibetan folk songs.
examples.sentence_zh: DJ在华语流行乐和藏民歌间切换自如

teach: jockey是职业骑师🏇也是职场老司机🚗！这个词源于苏格兰矮个子John（jock-ey），就像郭敬明驾驭文字般操控赛马🐎。说'暗箱操作'叫jockey the system（像麻将作弊🀄），'抢车位大战'是jockey for parking（堪比秋名山车神🏁）。记住：无论赛马场还是办公室，都在jockeying for position！

tips: 谐音梗：'脚跷'→骑师脚跷(jockey)在马镫上
易混词对比：jockey(职业骑师) vs joker(小丑)
记忆tip：想象骑师穿着Adidas三道杠赛马服

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根joc=玩笑（源自拉丁语jocus），后缀-ular=具有...性质的→像玩笑一样的

examples.sentence: His jocular response about working overtime being 'voluntary but mandatory' made everyone laugh.
examples.sentence_zh: 他关于加班是'自愿但强制'的诙谐回答逗笑了所有人。

examples.sentence: The professor's jocular comparison between quantum physics and mahjong tiles confused but amused students.
examples.sentence_zh: 教授将量子物理比作麻将牌的诙谐说法让学生们困惑又好笑。

teach: jocular是'专业段子手'认证标签🏷️！词源来自罗马神话笑神Jocus🤡，就像周星驰的无厘头碰上爱因斯坦的脑洞🧠。搭配'jocular tone'（戏谑语气）和'jocular remark'（玩笑话），吐槽'不好笑'可以说'as funny as a funeral'（像葬礼一样好笑）🌧️。记住：真正的jocular能让人笑着把咖啡喷出鼻孔☕️！

tips: 谐音梗：'嚼可乐'→嚼着可乐讲笑话
易混词对比：jovial（愉快的）侧重情绪，jocular（诙谐的）侧重表达方式

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根joc=玩笑（源自拉丁语jocus），-ular表形容词后缀，-ly变副词

examples.sentence: He jocularly pretended to sell his coworker's ergonomic chair on Xianyu.
examples.sentence_zh: 他打趣地假装要把同事的人体工学椅挂闲鱼卖掉。

examples.sentence: The professor jocularly called ChatGPT 'my teaching assistant who never sleeps'.
examples.sentence_zh: 教授打趣地称ChatGPT为'永不休息的助教'。

examples.sentence: The panda jocularly rolled down the hill like a furry dumpling.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫像毛绒汤圆般滑稽地滚下山坡。

examples.sentence: He jocularly mimicked his boss' WeChat voice messages in the meeting.
examples.sentence_zh: 他在会上滑稽地模仿老板的微信语音消息。

teach: jocularly是职场生存必备技能💼！古罗马人用jocus（玩笑）缓解澡堂社交尴尬🛁，现代人用jocularly化解微信已读不回📱。搭配'说'用jocularly remark（像在火锅局讲段子🍲），搭配'做'用act jocularly（像直播带货主播的浮夸表演🎭）。地道说法：'He's just being jocular'（他开玩笑的啦）🤹♂️

tips: 谐音梗：'嚼可乐力'→嚼着可乐味巧克力开玩笑
易混词对比：jovially（愉快地）vs jocularly（逗趣地）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自印度拉贾斯坦邦城市名Jodhpur（蓝城），无词根分解

meanings.meaning: 焦特布尔（印度西北部城市）

examples.sentence: The blue houses of Jodhpur glow like sapphires under the desert sun.
examples.sentence_zh: 焦特布尔的蓝房子在沙漠阳光下如蓝宝石般闪耀。

examples.sentence: Many Bollywood movies feature the majestic Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur.
examples.sentence_zh: 许多宝莱坞电影取景于焦特布尔雄伟的梅兰加尔古堡。

examples.sentence: The fashion designer combined Jodhpur pants with a Chinese tang suit.
examples.sentence_zh: 设计师将焦特布尔裤与中式唐装混搭。

teach: Jodhpur是印度'蓝色海洋'🟦：这座沙漠城市用靛蓝涂料防蚊虫+降温，现成网红打卡地📸。英国殖民者从这里带走'焦特布尔裤'👖（骑马裤），像兰州拉面走向全国🍜。记住：说'像焦特布尔一样蓝'比'emo忧郁'更高级💎！

tips: 视觉记忆：'Jodhpur'开头JO像蓝色屋顶
易混词：Jaipur（粉城斋浦尔）vs Jodhpur（蓝城）

etymology.meaning_connection: 可能源自中古英语'shoggen'（摇晃），模拟颠簸运动的拟声词

examples.sentence: She gave her sleepy husband a gentle jog with her elbow.
examples.sentence_zh: 她用胳膊肘轻轻推了推昏昏欲睡的丈夫。

examples.sentence: The subway crowd moved forward with constant little jogs.
examples.sentence_zh: 地铁人群在不断的轻微推挤中前进。

examples.sentence: Morning jog along the river has become his ritual.
examples.sentence_zh: 沿河晨跑已成为他的日常习惯。

examples.sentence: Beijing's Olympic Forest Park is ideal for a jog.
examples.sentence_zh: 北京奥林匹克森林公园是慢跑的绝佳去处。

examples.sentence: He jogged the ketchup bottle to get the last drop.
examples.sentence_zh: 他轻推番茄酱瓶子想倒出最后一滴。

examples.sentence: The grandma jogged the mahjong tile with her finger thoughtfully.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶若有所思地用手指轻推麻将牌。

examples.sentence: The overloaded donkey was jogging along the mountain path.
examples.sentence_zh: 超载的毛驴在山路上蹒跚前行。

examples.sentence: Tourists jogged up the Great Wall with heavy camera equipment.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客们扛着沉重的摄像设备踉跄地登上长城。

examples.sentence: White-collar workers jog around CBD during lunch breaks.
examples.sentence_zh: 白领们午休时在中央商务区周围慢跑。

examples.sentence: Jogging backwards is trending in Shanghai parks.
examples.sentence_zh: 倒着慢跑正在上海公园里流行。

examples.sentence: The smell of stinky tofu jogged his memory of Taipei night markets.
examples.sentence_zh: 臭豆腐的味道唤起了他对台北夜市的记忆。

examples.sentence: The project has been jogging along since the new manager came.
examples.sentence_zh: 新经理上任后项目进展平稳。

teach: jog就像广场舞大妈的节奏💃——轻轻推搡叫jog（'别挤啦！'），颠簸前进叫jog（像骑共享单车过减速带🚲），晨跑也叫jog（穿睡衣遛弯的大爷🏃）。搭配记忆：'慢跑减肥'说jog off calories，'记忆卡壳'用jog memory唤醒。地道说法：'龟速前进'叫jog along like a tortoise🐢

tips: 谐音梗：'脚搁'→脚搁(jog)在跑步机上
易混词：jog（有节奏慢跑）vs sprint（冲刺）

etymology.meaning_connection: jog（慢跑）+ -er（表示人）→ 慢跑的人

examples.sentence: The park is full of joggers at dawn, creating a human conveyor belt.
examples.sentence_zh: 黎明时公园里满是慢跑者，形成一条人肉传送带。

examples.sentence: A determined jogger kept running even when chased by a Pomeranian.
examples.sentence_zh: 一位坚定的慢跑者即使被博美犬追赶也坚持跑步。

examples.sentence: The printer adjusted the jogger to align the paper stacks.
examples.sentence_zh: 印刷工调整撞纸机来对齐纸堆。

examples.sentence: This antique jogger from 1920s is displayed in the Printing Museum.
examples.sentence_zh: 这台1920年代的古老撞纸机在印刷博物馆展出。

teach: jogger是晨跑界扫地僧🏃！词尾-er暴露了它'人'的本质（像teacher/runner）。有趣的是印刷业的撞纸机也叫jogger，因为会像跑步一样抖动纸张📄。说'晨跑族'用jogging squad，'跑出马甲线'叫jog one's way to abs🍫。记住：真正的jogger永远在'明天开始跑步'和'跑完吃火锅'之间徘徊！

tips: 谐音梗：'脚尬'→用脚尴尬跑步的人
易混词对比：jogger（人）vs. jogging（运动）

etymology.meaning_connection: jog=轻推/慢跑动作，-ing表持续状态→持续慢跑

examples.sentence: Morning jogging along the West Lake is a Hangzhou tradition.
examples.sentence_zh: 沿西湖晨跑是杭州人的传统。

examples.sentence: His jogging route passes 5 milk tea shops - that's what we call motivation!
examples.sentence_zh: 他的慢跑路线经过5家奶茶店——这就是动力！

teach: jogging其实是'摇摇晃晃的快乐'🏃‍♂️！中世纪英语里jog指马儿颠簸小跑，现代变成人类的佛系运动。'公园大爷式慢跑'叫turtle jog（龟速跑），'跑完炫奶茶'是jogger's guilt（跑者罪恶感）。记住：真正的jogging速度应该慢到能数清路边有几颗小龙坎！🌶️🥤🐢

tips: 谐音梗：'脚跟'→慢跑靠脚跟着地
易混词：jogging（匀速慢跑）vs sprinting（冲刺跑）

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自jog(轻推)的小称形式，-le表示反复动作→描述轻微摇晃的持续性动作

examples.sentence: The grandma joggled the baby's cradle with her foot while knitting.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶一边织毛衣一边用脚轻摇婴儿摇篮。

examples.sentence: He joggled the key in the rusty lock like shaking a cocktail.
examples.sentence_zh: 他像摇鸡尾酒般轻轻晃动锈锁中的钥匙。

examples.sentence: Skyscrapers joggle slightly during typhoons like bamboo in the wind.
examples.sentence_zh: 台风天摩天大楼会像风中的竹子般轻微摇动。

examples.sentence: His knees joggled nervously under the interview table.
examples.sentence_zh: 面试时他的膝盖在桌下紧张地不停摇动。

examples.sentence: Lanterns joggled along the ancient street during the festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 节日里灯笼在古街上摇曳。

examples.sentence: The fishing boat joggled on the waves like a duckling.
examples.sentence_zh: 渔船像小鸭子般在波浪上摇曳。

examples.sentence: The carpenter joggled the wooden joints like solving a 3D puzzle.
examples.sentence_zh: 木匠像解立体拼图般啮合木质接榫。

examples.sentence: Lego pieces joggle together with satisfying clicks.
examples.sentence_zh: 乐高零件啮合时会发出令人愉悦的咔嗒声。

examples.sentence: A gentle joggle of the vending machine made the snack fall.
examples.sentence_zh: 自动售货机被轻轻一摇就掉出了零食。

examples.sentence: The subway gave a sudden joggle that spilled my boba tea.
examples.sentence_zh: 地铁突然的轻摇使我的珍珠奶茶洒了出来。

examples.sentence: The joggles on this traditional Chinese cabinet don't need nails.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个中式柜子的啮合扣不需要钉子。

examples.sentence: 3D-printed joggles allow quick assembly of furniture.
examples.sentence_zh: 3D打印的啮合扣能让家具快速组装。

teach: joggle是'摇摆界的小碎步'💃：想象熊猫幼崽摇竹竿🐼（joggle the bamboo），乐高积木的咔嗒咬合（joggle together），还有奶茶被地铁晃洒的痛😭（sudden joggle）。说'抖腿'可以叫nervous joggle，'摇出WiFi信号'叫joggle the router📶。记住：joggle比jiggle更机械感，比shake更温柔！

tips: 谐音梗：'脚个'→用脚轻摇(joggle)摇篮
易混词：jiggle(快速抖动) vs joggle(有节奏轻摇)
记忆桩：JO字像摇摆的人，GG像两个齿轮咬合

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自常见男子名John的俚语化用法，16世纪起用代指'男性顾客'，后衍生出不同语境下的特殊含义

examples.sentence: Excuse me, where's the john in this hotpot restaurant?
examples.sentence_zh: 请问这家火锅店的洗手间在哪里？

examples.sentence: The airplane john was occupied by a TikTok live streamer for 40 minutes.
examples.sentence_zh: 飞机洗手间被一个抖音主播占用了40分钟。

examples.sentence: Construction workers built a temporary john at the site.
examples.sentence_zh: 工人们在工地搭建了临时厕所。

examples.sentence: Never charge your phone in a public john!
examples.sentence_zh: 千万别在公厕里给手机充电！

examples.sentence: Undercover cops arrested three johns near the massage parlor.
examples.sentence_zh: 便衣警察在按摩店附近逮捕了三名嫖客。

examples.sentence: The novel describes how johns were blackmailed during Qing Dynasty.
examples.sentence_zh: 这部小说描写了清代嫖客如何被敲诈。

teach: john的三种身份🚽💵👮：1) 源自莎士比亚时代'John Doe'指代无名氏 2) 盥洗室含义来自抽水马桶发明者John Harington爵士 3) 嫖客义项像扫码支付——给钱就走💸 搭配：'hit the john'（上厕所）、'john boat'（老式马桶船）。说'内急'可喊My bladder's singing opera!（膀胱在唱京剧啦）

tips: 谐音梗：'酱'→厕所都是重口味酱料味
易混词：toilet（正式）/loo（英式）/latrine（军用）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自拉丁语iungere，意为结合/连接，原始印欧语词根*yeug-表示连接（同源词：yoke轭）

examples.sentence: Millions of netizens join the livestream shopping frenzy every night.
examples.sentence_zh: 每晚数百万网友参与直播抢购狂欢。

examples.sentence: Foreigners can join the square dancing if they dare.
examples.sentence_zh: 外国友人敢的话也能加入广场舞。

examples.sentence: Where the Yangtze River joins the East China Sea, a golden delta forms.
examples.sentence_zh: 长江与东海结合处形成金色三角洲。

examples.sentence: The new bridge joins two provinces with 5G coverage.
examples.sentence_zh: 新大桥连接起两个5G覆盖的省份。

examples.sentence: Join the USB cable to your Huawei charger.
examples.sentence_zh: 将数据线连接到华为充电器。

examples.sentence: The join of the dumpling wrapper must be pinched tightly.
examples.sentence_zh: 饺子皮的接合处必须捏紧。

examples.sentence: Check the pipe joins for leaks after installation.
examples.sentence_zh: 安装后检查管道接合处是否漏水。

examples.sentence: Even grandmas join in shooting TikTok videos now.
examples.sentence_zh: 现在连老太太都参与拍摄抖音视频。

examples.sentence: BAT companies joined hands to develop AI chips.
examples.sentence_zh: 互联网三巨头联手开发AI芯片。

teach: join的本质就是'贴贴'🤝！从古代木匠的榫卯结构（wooden joinery）到现代微信群聊（join the group），人类永远在找组织。说'加入我们'地道表达是jump on board（像登船🚢），'强强联合'叫join forces像复仇者联盟集结💥。记住：join something是物理连接，join in something才是参与活动！

tips: 谐音梗：'嫁音'→通过联姻(join)结合家族
易混对比：attend侧重出席，join强调成为成员

etymology.meaning_connection: join源自拉丁语iungere（连接），-ed表过去时/分词形式

examples.sentence: The carpenter joined the mahjong table legs with golden nails.
examples.sentence_zh: 木匠用金钉连接了麻将桌的桌腿。

examples.sentence: Two metro lines are joined at this transfer station.
examples.sentence_zh: 两条地铁线在此换乘站相连接。

examples.sentence: She joined a douyin influencer team last month.
examples.sentence_zh: 她上个月加入了一个抖音网红团队。

examples.sentence: Over 50 countries have joined the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank.
examples.sentence_zh: 已有50多个国家加入亚投行。

examples.sentence: We joined a spicy hotpot eating contest in Chongqing.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在重庆参加了一场麻辣火锅大胃王比赛。

examples.sentence: He joined the online meeting while riding a shared bike.
examples.sentence_zh: 他骑共享单车时参加了线上会议。

examples.sentence: Huawei and DJI joined forces to develop 5G drones.
examples.sentence_zh: 华为与大疆联手开发5G无人机。

examples.sentence: The twin pandas are always joined at the hip in the zoo.
examples.sentence_zh: 动物园里的双胞胎熊猫总是形影不离。

teach: joined就像火锅鸳鸯锅🥘！当'连接'时是清汤红汤合并的隔板（joined parts），'加入'像涮毛肚时伸筷子🥢（joined the meal），'参加'像围观大妈跳广场舞💃（joined the party）。地道说法：'入伙'叫get on board，'拼单'叫join orders。记住：joined的本质是打破孤独！👯♀️🤝🎉

tips: 谐音梗：'找因的'→找到组织的原因(joined)
易混词：connect侧重物理连接，join强调成为整体

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根join=连接，后缀-er表人或工具→专门从事连接工作的人或物

examples.sentence: The joiner crafted a mahjong table with hidden cup holders.
examples.sentence_zh: 木匠制作了带隐藏杯托的麻将桌。

examples.sentence: Like a joiner assembling puzzle pieces, he perfected the wooden screen.
examples.sentence_zh: 他像拼图般精心组装木屏风。

examples.sentence: As a relationship joiner, she introduced two rival hotpot brands to collaborate.
examples.sentence_zh: 作为中间人，她促成了两家火锅品牌的合作。

examples.sentence: The subway joiner connected three lines with bubble tea shops along the way.
examples.sentence_zh: 地铁联络线沿途连接多家奶茶店。

examples.sentence: The 3D-printed joiner fused bamboo and carbon fiber seamlessly.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个3D打印连接件完美融合竹材与碳纤维。

examples.sentence: Check the pipe joiner before the hotpot feast to avoid leaks.
examples.sentence_zh: 吃火锅前记得检查燃气管接头。

examples.sentence: As a social joiner, he's in 15 WeChat groups about spicy food.
examples.sentence_zh: 作为社交达人，他加了15个辣味美食微信群。

examples.sentence: The late joiner brought stinky tofu to the hotpot party.
examples.sentence_zh: 迟到的加入者为火锅局带来了臭豆腐。

teach: joiner是隐形英雄🔨！就像火锅里的鸳鸯锅中间那个隔板（hotpot divider），默默连接红汤白汤🌶️🥛。'细工木匠'讲究榫卯结构不用钉子，好比用筷子搭桥🥢；'接合者'像月老牵红线🧶（matchmaker）；'接合物'则是手机充电口的Type-C头🔌。记住：好的joiner能让鸳鸯锅不串味！

tips: 谐音梗：'找哪'→joiner总在找哪(join)里需要连接
易混词对比：carpenter（粗木匠）vs joiner（精细木工）
联想记忆：joiner的'er'像小锤子

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根join=连接，后缀-ery表场所/行业→'通过榫卯连接的工艺'

examples.sentence: The mortise-and-tenon joinery in this Ming dynasty cabinet has lasted 600 years.
examples.sentence_zh: 这件明代橱柜的榫卯细木工技术已完好保存600年。

examples.sentence: Japanese joinery doesn't use nails, just like advanced 3D puzzles.
examples.sentence_zh: 日本细木工技术不用钉子，就像高级立体拼图。

examples.sentence: The joinery on this wooden phone case makes it shockproof.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个木质手机壳的细木工活让它具备防震功能。

examples.sentence: IKEA flat-pack furniture is the antithesis of traditional joinery.
examples.sentence_zh: 宜家平板包装家具是传统细木工活的反面教材。

examples.sentence: With 3D printing, the joinery industry is facing revolutionary changes.
examples.sentence_zh: 随着3D打印技术出现，细木工行业正面临革命性变革。

examples.sentence: Lu Ban is considered the patron saint of Chinese joinery.
examples.sentence_zh: 鲁班被视作中国细木工行业的守护神。

examples.sentence: The Forbidden City's windows showcase imperial fine joinery.
examples.sentence_zh: 故宫的窗棂展现了皇家精细木作工艺。

teach: joinery是木头界的乐高大师🧩！鲁班锁的玄机就在这个词里——不用胶水钉子，全靠精确切割（就像程序员不用胶水写代码💻）。搭配'woodworking'指普通木工，'carpentry'是粗木工。说'手艺糙'可以用butcher the joinery（把细木工活做成屠宰现场）🤹♂️。记住：好的joinery就像爱情，严丝合缝才能长久❤️！

tips: 谐音梗：'找内瑞'→找内行(joinery)做细活
易混词：carpentry（粗木工）vs joinery（精木工）
记忆tip：join+ery=把木头'接'起来的'行业'

etymology.meaning_connection: join源自古法语'joindre'（连接），-ing表名词化→连接的动作或结果

examples.sentence: The joining of this Hanfu sleeve is embroidered with golden threads.
examples.sentence_zh: 这件汉服袖子的接缝处用金线绣着花纹。

examples.sentence: Check the joining of the pipes for potential leaks.
examples.sentence_zh: 检查管道接缝处是否有潜在渗漏。

examples.sentence: The joining of two rivers creates a spectacular view in Chongqing.
examples.sentence_zh: 两条江的连接在重庆形成了壮观的景色。

examples.sentence: 3D printing allows precise joining of complex components.
examples.sentence_zh: 3D打印技术能实现复杂零件的精准连接。

examples.sentence: This LEGO set includes special joinings for building spaceships.
examples.sentence_zh: 这套乐高包含搭建太空船的特殊连接物。

examples.sentence: Traditional Chinese carpentry uses wooden joinings instead of nails.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国传统木工使用木制连接物而非钉子。

examples.sentence: The gym waives joining fees during Spring Festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 春节期间健身房免收入会费。

teach: joining就像人际关系👥：好的接缝如同闺蜜逛街手挽手👭（smooth joining），糟糕的连接就像相亲现场尬聊💔（awkward joining）。'入伙费'叫joining fee就像火锅AA制🍲，'无缝衔接'说seamless joining就像奶茶第二杯半价🥤。记住：人生就是不断joining和rejoining的过程！

tips: 谐音梗：'找一宁'→找一宁(joining)师傅修家具
易混词对比：joint（关节）vs joining（连接过程）

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自古法语joint（连接），源自拉丁语iunctus（连接），与join同源

examples.sentence: The plumber fixed the leak at the pipe joint.
examples.sentence_zh: 水管工修好了管子连接处的漏水。

examples.sentence: Check the joints of the Lego pieces to ensure stability.
examples.sentence_zh: 检查乐高积木的连接处以确保稳固。

examples.sentence: My knee joint hurts after hiking Mount Tai.
examples.sentence_zh: 爬完泰山后我的膝关节疼。

examples.sentence: Pandas have special thumb joints to hold bamboo.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫有特殊的拇指关节来握竹子。

examples.sentence: We opened a joint WeChat mini-program for our startup.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们为创业项目开通了共同的微信小程序。

examples.sentence: The joint effort saved the drowning elephant.
examples.sentence_zh: 共同努力救起了溺水的大象。

examples.sentence: This joint ticket allows access to both the Forbidden City and the Great Wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 这张联票可游览故宫和长城。

examples.sentence: The craftsman jointed the mahjong tiles with precision.
examples.sentence_zh: 工匠精准地连接了麻将牌。

examples.sentence: The puzzle pieces joint perfectly.
examples.sentence_zh: 拼图碎片完美贴合。

examples.sentence: This Tesla-GE joint venture produces charging stations.
examples.sentence_zh: 这家特斯拉与通用的合资企业生产充电桩。

examples.sentence: His shoulder went out of joint while doing tai chi.
examples.sentence_zh: 他打太极拳时肩膀脱臼了。

teach: joint就像火锅鸳鸯锅🍲！名词时是连接的'格子'（关节/接口），形容词时是'共用的汤底'（joint account共同账户），动词时是'拼桌'动作🤝。说'我们AA'英文叫go Dutch（荷兰式），但'合资'却是joint venture（绝不叫go Chinese！）。记住：从人体关节到商业合作，都是joint的江湖！💼🦴🔗

tips: 谐音梗：'找因他'→找因他(joint)修关节
对比记忆：join（动作）→joint（结果状态）
